ygData.subject: Re: How Do You Play This Game?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Friends, I play in the 3rd person view, but pulled back just a bit from the initial camera switch. When you pull back and then zoom back in, you find the
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Friends,

I play in the 3rd person view, but pulled back just a bit from the initial
camera switch. When you pull back and then zoom back in, you find the view
will only return to showing yourself from about the knees up. The reason I
play this way is first person views trigger motion sickness. I have to avoid
games where first person is the only view. I do have to switch briefly to
first person for swimming in Kedge and that darn ladder out of the Mino
Elder pit in LG. As for keys, you don't want to know what I use as I got
used to some keys from Beta 3 and have never bothered to change my reflexes.
I twist songs with the mouse, as my hotkeys are mostly tied up with other
junk.

P.S. Made L46 last night in KK, and a big ole shark gave me a shiny new helm
for a present. =)

Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur
